profileAlternative.name: Emily Siyang Li
profileAlternative.headline: Data Analyst at LinkedIn
profileAlternative.summary: Having big data does not necessarily mean more effective marketing; instead, it is the insights derived from the data and the decisions made based on the insights that will make all the difference. I am passionate about transforming data findings to business insights by employing the models and techniques, and business analytics to help businessman make better decision. Also I am capable of interpreting data findings and data visualization. With the help of data analytical tools, I am able to paint an accurate and timely picture of transactions in the demographics, the location, purchase history, and what and how customers are likely to buy in the future.

items: Highest Honors in Sciences and Mathematics
Jack Halloran’s Business and Accounting Scholarship
Data Mining for Identification of Consumer Behavior Patterns
Data Warehousing for Business Intelligence Analysis

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Data really powers everything that we do.
